thread.title: Ahok: FPI leader so embarrassed he worked at US restaurant chain he said he worked at ‘Fitsa Hats’ instead (cue memes)
thread.title_full: Ahok: FPI leader so embarrassed he worked at US restaurant chain he said he worked at ‘Fitsa Hats’ instead (cue memes)

author: Coconuts Jakarta
title: Ahok: FPI leader so embarrassed he worked at US restaurant chain he said he worked at ‘Fitsa Hats’ instead (cue memes)
text:
Ahok: FPI leader so embarrassed he worked at US restaurant chain he said he worked at ‘Fitsa Hats’ instead (cue memes) By Coconuts Jakarta January 4, 2017 / 10:46   0 
Yesterday, Jakarta Governor Basuki “Ahok” Tjahaja Purnama faced the third session of his ongoing blasphemy trial which saw a number of witnesses testifying against him. All of the witnesses were associated with Islamic hardliner organizations such as the Islamic Defenders Front (FPI) that have been pushing for Ahok to be jailed over a single sentence of a speech he made in the Thousand Islands back in September (a speech, the defense noted, that none of the witnesses had actually attended). 
Ahok apparently did not sit idly by during their testimony, at one point shouting at a witness “ 'Who has given FPI the authority to speak on behalf of all Muslims?” 
During a press conference later in the day, Ahok told reporters about a few other problems he had with the prosecution’s witnesses. He specifically singled out FPI Jakarta secretary general Habib Novel for an odd discrepancy on the official court document detailing Novel’s personal details, which Novel signed off on as being complete and accurate. 
"The name of the witness is Habib Novel. He worked from 1992 to 1995 at Pizza Hut. But perhaps because he was embarrassed to work at Pizza Hut, because it’s an American company, he deliberately wrote Fitsa Hats," Ahok said as quoted by Detik . 
"He deliberately changed it. This is what I saw. I have to laugh. He says he did not notice, however, he signed off on it all," Ahok said, showing off the court documents. 
According to Ahok, Novel was ashamed to acknowledge that he worked for the American pizza powerhouse because of how often he said that Muslims should not be led by non-Muslims. 
"I think he was embarrassed because he said Muslims should not be led by people who are not believers, the kafir (infidels)," Ahok said. 
And thus a meme was born. Bukti BERITA ACARA habib Novel .. FITSA HATS bukan di KENTAKI FRED CIKEN apalagi MEK DONAL .. #kamuKetahuanBohong pic.twitter.com/oUK2JM9Ryv — Rudi Valinka #HOKI (@kurawa) January 3, 2017 
Netizens almost instantly started producing Fitsa Hats jokes at an incredible rate, causing it to trend on social media throughout last night and into this morning.
